title: Didnt Get Rp For Bring a Mate
body: So i my friend got lvl 10 and i refered it but never got my 1000 rp for him getting to lvl 10 its been about 3-4 weeks now :/ help pls

replies.body: but my friend hit lvl 10 but i havent got the 1000 rp its been 3-4 weeks idk what to do

> [{quoted}](name=Stop Feed Plz,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=XlA2n92w,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-06-02T11:22:13.693+0000)
>
> but my friend hit lvl 10 but i havent got the 1000 rp its been 3-4 weeks idk what to do

You don't get RP you get IP, omg.

Pick up a dictionary.

For every friend you refer who reaches level 10, you’ll earn 1,000 IP. You can refer a total of five friends, and with three successful referrals, you’ll unlock the Grey Warwick skin. Recruit five friends and you’ll unlock Medieval Twitch.
i doubt they would give you 1000rp just for referring a friend and him getting too lvl 10. so much abuse would happen.
